source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a close-up, low-angle shot of a golf scene on a green lawn. In the middle ground, the lower legs of a person stand on the left side of the frame. In the foreground, a large pink ball is positioned on the right, with a small white golf ball just to its left in the center. The head of a golf driver, held by the person, swings from the left across the center of the frame, striking the pink ball. Upon impact, the pink ball bursts, and a large splash of white liquid erupts outwards from its position on the right. The small white golf ball is propelled forward and to the right through the splash, while the remnants of the pink ball collapse onto the grass. The camera remains static and level with the balls on the ground throughout the action.
